title: King Sand Crab

properties.value: ​King Sand Crabs are aggressive monsters that look like sandy boulders while disguised, but attack when walked by. They are found inside the Catacombs of Kourend in the southeast section of the dungeon, as well as the Crabclaw Caves found south of the Woodcutting Guild.

content:
This article is about the stronger variant found in the Catacombs of Kourend. For the normal variant found on the coast of Hosidius, see Sand Crab.

​King Sand Crabs are aggressive monsters that look like sandy boulders while disguised, but attack when walked by. They are found inside the Catacombs of Kourend in the southeast section of the dungeon, as well as the Crabclaw Caves found south of the Woodcutting Guild.

As their name suggests, these crabs are significantly tougher with better combat stats, although still fairly weak for their level.
